body.name: Logitech StreamCam Plus Webcam with Tripod (Graphite) (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 9 hrs 23 mins.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

body.description: Take your content to the next level and share your passion with Logitech StreamCam. Featuring pristine image quality, dual front-facing microphones, versatile mounting options, and USB-C connectivity, Logitech StreamCam is even more powerful when used with Logitech Capture. Capture unlocks features on StreamCam that automate exposure, framing, stabilization and more, so you can focus on making your best content. Tired of looking a bit dull? Stream and record vibrant, true-to-life video with smooth motion and crisp details in full HD 1080p at 60 frames per second.

productInformation.value: #5,638 in Amazon Renewed (See Top 100 in Amazon Renewed) #385 in Renewed Camera & Photo #543 in Webcams

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best Webcams for Streaming available!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best available streaming Webcams. With a greenscreen, it does require some configuration. The 1080p60 quality makes streaming a dream. Even if you want to stream at 1440p or even 4K this thing will do everything that's needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great hardware compromised by mediocre software
reviews.reviewText: The video quality is excellent - however, I had several issues with integrating it into my setup as Logitech simply doesn’t offer state-of-the-art software for either Mac or PC. I tried looping it through 3rd party software, which worked to a certain extend. But given that its price puts it in the premium category, I would’ve expected more. Might be fine for casual use, but for anything serious or even remotely professional, this camera is held back by its software. I had to return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quizas tenia otra expectativa con esta camara segun los reviews que habia visto de youtubers sobre ella, pero en verdad no es la gran cosa, es simplemente una camara web con bonita calidad de imagen frente a muchas camaras del mercado. Basicamente mejora un poco la imagen y nitidez, recuerda, no es una camara profesional de estudio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make sure you buy an adapter if you own a pc
reviews.reviewText: The camera overall works well for streaming. My only gripe is that it has a usb c male slot and my brand new pc did not come with this. Just do yourself a favor and purchase an adapter if you don’t have one when you buy this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Adequate until it wasn't
reviews.reviewText: I bought this webcam and a razer kyro at the beginning of the pandemic, assuming one of them would work for my needs- office setting with dedicated lights for streaming. After trying out both, I used the kiyo for work, and the streamcam for the rare times I needed a webcam for personal use.The autofocus and 60fps never quite compensated for the grainy picture the streamcam gave even in optimal lighting.Then, about three years after I bought the streamcam, it stopped working altogether.Webcams are something you expect to last a long time. Three years is not very long for such an expensive webcam, especially when the $50 razer kiyo outperformed it in all ways except fps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great picture but not able to rotate outside of software
reviews.reviewText: I am on video calls all day for work. This is a huge jump in picture quality over the C920. Only problem is it is advertised as able to rotate 90 degrees. Which is not false, it can only be done using the Logitech software. My hope was this can be done within Microsoft Teams.Purchased renewed and the webcam was flawless with all cables and mounts as described

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Great camera, low rating for missing parts
reviews.reviewText: Camera works fine, but it did not come with the tripod or the mount for the tripod and Im unable to get the parts ordered from Logitech, so I've basically paid for a mostly unusable brick for me and how my setup is.
